title: Hood neoprene 7 mm Proterm XL - Tecline

photos.alt: Kaptur neoprenowy 7 mm Proterm (5) XL - Tecline
Hood neoprene 7 mm Proterm XL - Tecline

description:
Product description

For people who are quickly freezing in water. For divers who appreciate the highest thermal comfort combined with great comfort of putting on and taking off.

 

-very warm (best for diving in water with temperature below 10 degree)

-easy to put on and take off, also in gloves (super flexible neoprene)

-no punctual pressure and discomfort on the jaw and neck

 

The Proterm 7mm hood has been tested during long, deep dives.  The neoprene used for its production does not undergo fast, permanent compression.  Excellent adhesion to the face, provides high thermal comfort while using the scooter and during static decompression.

 

 

ATTENTION!

Hood sizes are averaged. The correct size depends on the user's personal characteristics (head shape, hair length, etc.). We recommend trying on our hoods before buying
